channel.title: Brent's Server Restarter
channel.description:
Hello, I've Made a new restarte:(Brent's Restarter v1.0 - not finished)
Note: Make sur you server runner (run.bat - runserver.bat) is always called: Runerver.bat or else it wont work) Note:Best Server restarter is with the background!
i show you some picture's:
[img]http://img44.imageshack.us/img44/1236/restarters.jpg[/img]
The one wth white background isnt advancet other is:
Download link: [url=http://uppit.com/v/7V72F07D]http://uppit.com/v/7V72F07D[/url]
Virusscan: [url=http://www.virustotal.com/nl/analisis/faba1e71d6f5c86a7775951b4aa1790478bb8339abfc5a6c1737c6e2db22b426-1246634108]http://www.virustotal.com/nl/analisis/faba1e71d6f5c86a7775951b4aa1790478bb8339abfc5a6c1737c6e2db22b426-1246634108[/url]
